commit message:
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/johan12345/opacclient

Conflicts:
AndroidManifest.xml
I don't know why I head to refresh the submodules again…
Result list: Number of results / Empty text
Convert Info Activity to a fragment

Merge pull request #4 from raphaelm/master

update with latest commits from raphaelm

Replaced pagination with endless scrolling
using the implementation of EndlessScrollListener from
https://github.com/thecodepath/android_guides/wiki/Endless-Scrolling-with-AdapterViews
Seems to work perfectly.
Leave AboutActivity as it was for now

Fix NullPointerException when navigating back to results list from
detail activity
NavAdapter: Hardcoding positions is a bad idea
Adjust drawer to our app style

Revert 'Replaced pagination with endless scrolling using the implementation of EndlessScrollListener from https://github.com/thecodepath/android_guides/wiki/Endless-Scrolling-with-AdapterViews Seems to work perfectly.'

This reverts commit 1d3901bb1d647082d3692f5dcb319dd6e6011f1b.

Merge pull request #5 from raphaelm/master

update with latest commits from raphaelm
Add Loading indicator on detail page
Add error messages to Detail View
Add error message to Search results view
Fix bug with error message in detail view
unsupported_error and answer_error messages on AccountFragment

Merge pull request #201 from johan12345/master

Added loading indicator and error messages
Prevent IllegalStateExceptions from AsyncTasks in detatched fragments
You can not have the same view id twice in a layout file ;)

Merge pull request #6 from raphaelm/master

update with latest commits from raphaelm
Added tablet layout for Starred view

Merge pull request #202 from johan12345/master

Tablet layout for starred view

Small bugfix for tablet layout on starred view and border around search
form in tablet layout
Starred list items are now highlighted when selected on tablets

Merge pull request #203 from johan12345/master

Bugfixes for starred tablet view
The dark account header looks better in full width
More retained fragments, less useless network connections
Fix bugs from mail mail inbox
Mute an IllegalStateException we do not care about
Issue #166: Mark prolong icons we expect to fail

I might just have implemented links from the account view to the detail
view but I can not test it as the only BiBer opac I have current media
lent out went offline just now...
BiBer: Detail view from account view
Get rid of that last_error thingy (Issue #185)
First use of MUltiStepResultHandler, others will follow

Merge pull request #7 from raphaelm/master

update with latest commits from raphaelm
Link from account to detail view for iOpac

iOpac: show books which cannot be prolonged any more
This isn't visible from the HTML, so I added an attribute to the JSON
file with the maximum count of prolongings. If that isn't present, it
will not set the KEY_LENT_RENEWABLE attribute.

Lighter ActionBar overflow text color
fixes #204

Merge pull request #205 from johan12345/master

Added new abilities to iOpac
Working towards a more coherent API
Fix minor bug in title bar when coming from notifications

Merge pull request #8 from raphaelm/master

update with latest commits from raphaelm

Basic implementation of SRU (#163)
First testing catalogue is the GBV catalogue, we need to put the
supported search parameters in the JSON file, because they can be
different on each library. Also, it currently only supports a small set
of media properties, not all the ones supported by the MODS XML format.

Extended SRU:
multiple search parameters (defined in JSON)
right encoding (UTF-8)
convert ISBN13 to ISBN10 to get cover image from Amazon
SRU: added getResultById() and share URLs

Merge pull request #207 from johan12345/master

SRU implementation (#163)

Added Weimar Uni (PICA)
Account not supported because at least the login form looks different
Added Erfurt FH, Uni, Nordhausen FH

Added Göttingen Uni, Hildesheim Uni and HAWK, Jena EAH, Osnabrück
Hochschule, Wiesbaden EBS (all PICA)

Added: Braunschweig FH, Jade Hochschule Elsfleth/Wilhelmshaven,
Hochschule Hannover

Moved ISBN and Amazon Cover related functions to a separate class, added
covers to PICA
PICA, SRU: Remove Log and other unused imports

Merge pull request #208 from johan12345/master

Add more PICA libraries, Covers for PICA
Another try on endless scrolling, not working correctly yet (#73)

PICA: fixes, Endless scrolling: API doesn't need to return the page
count if it returns the result count.
Show progress bar when reloading old page
License for cwanc-endless, endless scrolling support flag for PICA
Endless scrolling works with Bibliotheca (tested with Aichtal)

Endless scrolling works with SISIS (tested with Amberg-Weiden
Hochschule)
Endless scrolling works with Zones22 (tested with Hamburg Bücherhallen)
Endless scrolling works with BiBer (tested with Offenburg)

Endless scrolling
This flag is no longer needed
PICA: Support different implementations of the 'search all' field
